title: Create a Sealed Shape Hierarchy
description:
Create a sealed interface Shape with two permitted implementations:
- record Circle(double radius) with area = PI * r^2
- record Square(double side) with area = side * side

Add a method that calculates area using pattern matching.

Expected output: 78.54 (for Circle with radius 5)

hints.text: Use 'sealed interface Shape permits Circle, Square {}' to define the sealed interface
Records automatically implement interfaces: record Circle(double radius) implements Shape {}
Use switch with record patterns: case Circle(double r) -> Math.PI * r * r;
